text: Vasile Silvian Ciupercă (14 July 1949 – 31 July 2022) was a Romanian politician. He was a member of the Social Democratic Party. He was in the Chamber of Deputies from 2001 to 2004. Ciupercă died on 31 July 2022 in Bucharest, Romania at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Romanian politicians
title: Vasile Silvian Ciupercă
